sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not associative with respect to intersection.
message_1: Let A = {0,1} and B = {1,2}. Calculate (A×B) ∩ B and A × (B ∩ {1}). Show that (A×B) ∩ B ≠ A × (B ∩ {1}), proving that the Cartesian product of two sets is not associative with respect to intersection.
